name: Ruby Sample
description: A barebones Ruby app using Sinatra

scripts.test-setup: cd /app/.indyno/vendor/postgresql/share/extension; git clone --branch v0.8.1 https://github.com/pgvector/pgvector.git; cd pgvector; export PG_CONFIG=/app/.indyno/vendor/postgresql/bin/pg_config; make; make install; cp -r /app/.indyno/vendor/postgresql/include/server/extension/vector /app/.indyno/vendor/postgresql/share/extension; ls /app/.indyno/vendor/postgresql/share/extension/vector;  psql $DATABASE_URL -c "create extension vector;"
